message:
Look at the INDIAN BRAND of ISLAM
and how they are linked to SHAHABAGH GONG ISLAM or call it FARIDUDDIN ISLAM (naaujubillah)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LA0j-oHbo3c
Go to the link: http://twocircles.net/2013mar16/talk_shahbagh_uprising_bangladesh_jamia.html

A talk on Shahbagh uprising of Bangladesh at Jamia

By TCN News

New Delhi: The Academy of International Studies at Jamia Millia Islamia is going to organize a talk on “The Shahbagh Uprising and its Implications for Bangladesh” by Professor Veena Sikri.

Prof. Veena Sikri, a Career Diplomat, holds the Ford Foundation Chair at Bangladesh Studies Programme, Academy of International Studies, Jamia Millia Islamia.

The programme is scheduled to be held on March 18, 2013 at 2.30 PM in Ho Chi Minh Conference Hall, Academy of International Studies, Jamia Millia Islamia.
name: JAMIA MILLIA ISLAMIA: INDIAN BRAND of ISLAM
